item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

int Gems[] = {###,###,###,###};

public int randomGem() { return Gems[(int)(Math.random()*Gems.length)]; }

addItem(randomGem(), 1);

Give that a try, add the Item Ids where the #'s are.

item.description:

Now, i got this code:

case 2111: if (actionTimer == 0) { addSkillXP((1700 * playerLevel[14]), 14); addItem(1601, 1); sendMessage("You mine a diamond. W00t :D"); setAnimation(624); actionTimer = 15; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;
You see addItem(1601, 1);
But how can i do that u get random gems?
